casebody.data:
The TOWN OF BEECH MOUNTAIN
v.
John MILLIGAN and wife, Sharon Milligan No. 288P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Tyler R. Moffatt, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Milligan, John. Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Attorney at Law, Kimberly McGuire Eggers, Attorney at Law, Boone, for The Town of Beech Mountain.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of August 2016 by Defendant (John Milligan) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
